main.name: Nirmal Silwal

resume.skillmessage: Technically astute software developer with over 2 years of experience developing and deploying complex enterprise architecture using Java, Spring Boot, Restful and AWS Cloud technologies

education.description: Major courses taken - Software Architecture, Algorithms, Web Application Architecture, Enterprise Architecture, Cloud Computing, DBMS

education.school: Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam Technical University

work.title: Software Development Engineer
work.description: Working in AWS Blu Age for the migration of legacy application for financial institution based on COBOL, AS400 to modern application in Java, SpringBoot, Angular.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Automated image caption generation process using Deep Learning, AWS Sagemaker helping visually impaired person with learning disability to understand the description of images who rely on screen readers, taking in consideration Accessibility motto "right to information". Developed various automation tools using Python.

work.title: Junior Java Developer
work.description: Internship : Developed web application using Java, SpringBoot and Hibernate.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Naz must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
